patterns: tell me something my maths teacher will hate
responses: I saw my math teacher with a piece of graph paper yesterday. I think he must be plotting something.
What did the triangle say to the circle? “You’re pointless.

I had an argument with a 90° angle. It turns out it was right.
Why was the obtuse triangle always upset? Because it’s never right.
